verses.verse: The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> is in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> like the <S%H6388>watercourses.<s%> <S%H4325><s%> He <S%H5186>turns<s%> it wherever he <S%H2654>desires.<s%>
Every <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8505>weighs<s%> the <S%H3826>hearts.<s%>
To <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H6666>justice<s%> is more <S%H977>acceptable<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> than <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>
A <S%H7312>high<s%> <S%H5869>look,<s%> and a <S%H7342>proud<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> the <S%H5215>lamp<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> is <S%H2403>sin.<s%>
The <S%H4284>plans<s%> of the <S%H2742>diligent<s%> surely lead to <S%H4195>profit;<s%> and everyone who is <S%H213>hasty<s%> surely rushes to <S%H4270>poverty.<s%>
<S%H6467>Getting<s%> <S%H214>treasures<s%> by a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is a fleeting <S%H1892>vapor<s%> <S%H5086>for<s%> those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4194>death.<s%>
The <S%H7701>violence<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H1641>drive<s%> them <S%H3985>away,<s%> because they refuse to <S%H6213>do<s%> what is <S%H4941>right.<s%>
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H376>the<s%> <S%H2054>guilty<s%> is <S%H2019>devious,<s%> but the <S%H6467>conduct<s%> of the <S%H2134>innocent<s%> is <S%H3477>upright.<s%>

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6438>corner<s%> of the <S%H1406>housetop,<s%> than to <S%H2267>share<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> with a <S%H4079>contentious<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>
The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H183>desires<s%> <S%H7451>evil;<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> finds no <S%H2603>mercy<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

When the <S%H3887>mocker<s%> is <S%H6064>punished,<s%> the <S%H6612>simple<s%> gains <S%H2449>wisdom.<s%> When the <S%H2449>wise<s%> is <S%H7919>instructed,<s%> he <S%H3947>receives<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
The <S%H6662>Righteous<s%> One <S%H7919>considers<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and <S%H5557>brings<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> to <S%H7451>ruin.<s%>
Whoever <S%H331>stops<s%> his <S%H241>ears<s%> at the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> he will also <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H6030>out,<s%> but shall not be heard.
A <S%H4976>gift<s%> in <S%H5643>secret<s%> <S%H3711>pacifies<s%> <S%H639>anger;<s%> and a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> in the <S%H2436>cloak,<s%> <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>
It is <S%H8057>joy<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justice;<s%> but it is a <S%H4288>destruction<s%> to the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
The <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H8582>wanders<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H7919>understanding<s%> shall <S%H5117>rest<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H7496>dead.<s%>
He who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H8057>pleasure<s%> shall be a <S%H4270>poor<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%> He who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> shall not be <S%H6238>rich.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> for the <S%H6662>upright.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in a <S%H776>desert<s%> <S%H4079>land,<s%> than with a contentious and <S%H3708>fretful<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>
There is <S%H2530>precious<s%> <S%H214>treasure<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> in the <S%H5116>dwelling<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise;<s%> but a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> swallows it <S%H1104>up.<s%>
He who <S%H7291>follows<s%> after <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H3519>honor.<s%>
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> man <S%H5927>scales<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> and brings <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of its <S%H4009>confidence.<s%>
Whoever <S%H8104>guards<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H8104>keeps<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> and <S%H2086>haughty<s%> <S%H3887>man,<s%> "scoffer" is his <S%H8034>name;<s%> he <S%H6213>works<s%> in the <S%H5678>arrogance<s%> of <S%H2087>pride.<s%>
The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H4191>kills<s%> <S%H3027>him,<s%> for his hands <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H6213>labor.<s%>
There are those who <S%H183>covet<s%> <S%H8378>greedily<s%> all <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6662>long;<s%> but the righteous <S%H5414>give<s%> and <S%H2820>don't<s%> withhold.
The <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination:<s%> how much <S%H935>more,<s%> when he brings it with a wicked <S%H2154>mind!<s%>
A <S%H3577>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> will <S%H6>perish,<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H8085>listens<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> to <S%H5331>eternity.<s%>
A <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5810>hardens<s%> his <S%H6440>face;<s%> but as for the <S%H3477>upright,<s%> he <S%H995>establishes<s%> his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
There is no <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> nor <S%H8394>understanding<s%> nor <S%H6098>counsel<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H5483>horse<s%> is <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle;<s%> but <S%H8668>victory<s%> is with <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
